question: My husband was arguing with me he said main tumahain tallaq daita hoon,tallaq,tallaq.
answer:
QUESTION

assalamoalikum mufrti saheb .....iam very much in trouble please help me out...

1.my husband was arguing with me he said main tumahain tallaq daita hoon,tallaq,tallaq.in anger,when he was saying this i put my hand on his mouth ..he is saying i told you 2 times he also said go away i dont want you,i can live my life by my self i hat my marriage and our marriage was wrong i dont want you..please kindly answer my question i shall be very thank full to you...

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

The following statements in your question need further clarification:

What does your husband mean when he says “I told you two times”. Does he mean he intended two divorces?
Did he intend talaq when he said: “Go away, I don’t want you…”

Kindly reply with further clarification and we will Insha-Allah reply to you query.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam
